segments.text: Ugh, the sink's overflowing, water sloshing all over like a filthy flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor is gross, spreading dirt and grime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in it, her dress hem probably getting soaked and nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's handling that plate like it's clean, but everything's turning messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, reaching into the cookie jar with who knows what on their hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's wobbling on that wet floor, disgusting if he falls into the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand out, begging for treats in this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets open, water dripping down the doors, ruining the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks clean, unlike this sloppy interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked, probably not even washed properly yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet blasting away, wasting water in the most irritating way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how unhygienic this whole setup is getting.
segments.speaker: PAR
